name: Ekta Paliwal
text: Nice spot for quick meal. Staff was really helpful. They overdo one pizza mistakenly, so they replaced and made new one on request. Pizza crust here is so crispy and well done.

name: Marv Bero
text: First visit but won't be my last. Walk up to counter to order.  Choose 6" or 11" pizza (also have thick crust and gluten free) and then select any and all sauces, cheeses, meats, veggies, etc that you want. Price is the same no matter what …More

name: Alexandra Goldina
text: Great options for vegans. The dough and many sauces are vegan. Finished off with a fig balsamic glaze for an extra kick!

name: Mary Koffinas
text: What an amazing experience! We just went here for the first time, service was fantastic, the ingredients were fresh, and the crust stayed crispy even after I loaded my pizza up with toppings. Added bonus, I have an allergy to mushrooms, and …More

name: Brooks Darkraven
text:
Bestest pizza!
Point at ingredients, they go on the little pizza. One topping or twenty...same price. …More

name: K. Payne
text: I actually got to have pizza my way.  Yep, I added pineapple, artichoke hearts, olives,  ricotta, fresh basil, chicken and roasted red peppers to accompany the mozzarella and marinara on my pizza dough.   Delicious!   As many toppings as I wanted for one low price!  Why can't all pizza restaurants do this?

name: Gabriel Herrera
text: Much better than my previous experience. They had clean plates at this location. Would recommend the workers not state that the sauce is off in front of customers though. Might try a different location to see if it's different. Was not happy at not having napkins and such

name: Cecilia C
text: I love the fact that they offer dairy free,  gluten free pizza and even cauliflower crust pizza. You can also get to customize your toppings if you like but they also have their own selection.  Service is quick, price is reasonable - about $8.00 for 11 inch thick crust and most of all, pizza is delicious!

name: Dexter Tech_Microatlarge
text: The pizza rates at a high score in taste and in varied combinations. I enjoy the opportunity to socialize there. The site it's very comfortable, I'm going there in my nice clothes and a great mood. Let's eat some pizza and talk about some success in life.

name: Katherine M.
text: Amazing staff. I went on Teacher Appreciation night around 6:30-7:00. The staff was great even though they were understaffed. They worked hard and efficiently. Even though the line was long, they greeted each customer as if they were their only one.

name: Corentin Leman
text: Pretty good, and at the right price!

name: Chinyere Achusim
text: The staff was great. It was lunch and they were packed, so they weren't able to make my milkshake - which I understood. But they took care of it with grace. And despite being busy, my pizza was good and cooked very well. :] …More

name: Alysa Pociejewski
text: Not terrible, but not amazing. It was mediocre sauce and toppings on a mediocre crust. The crust gets soggy within a few minutes. Not blown away. Needless to say I am disappointing after I heard everyone rave about it. The workers here also tried to rush my ordering process, which was annoying. Very underwhelming experience.

name: Petar Kostur
text: They make a great pizza and three service is excellent. Everytime we're go the whole family loves it, plus it doesn't break the bank

name: Michael Mandujano
text: Pizza was mediocre. Was a Friday night, maybe four other people, and the place was really dirty. Juice self-serve fountain drinks looked like they hadn't been cleaned in months. I counted about ten tables that were dirty. And it wasn't like …More

name: Victoria Colón
text: Amazing food and great staff! Ty is an amazing and dedicated worker. Will definitely be back!

name: Kasia Laba
text: The guys working today were awesome!! Keep up the good work!

name: Mike Oelrich
text: I like to get what they call "megadough" on my pizza here. It stands up to the unlimited toppings better than their standard fairly thin crust. Also, if you ask for it 'well-done' it will come out nice and crusty without any gumminess.

name: Michael Valdez
text: My first experience at MOD was the location off of Army Trail.. great experience great team.. at that location.. tonight when I walked up to the store one of the employees was outside talking to someone in a SUV as I approached the door she …More

name: Mitchell Stutzman
text: The pizza was unreal. Its spicy, crunchy, meaty. PERFECT! I find myself trying to find reasons to go that far from where I live, just so we can go back.

name: Aaron Horvath
text: Good as long as they keep it clean

name: Ronald Hand
text: I like their pizza. Especially since it is fast and fresh.

name: Garrett Snyder
text: This is my favorite pizza place to go to. You can get an 11" or 6" for a standard price and you're allowed to add whatever toppings you desire. The taste and freshness are fantastic and this is a great place for a fast pizza and a cool hangout spot for groups.

name: Nelson Grihalde
text: Although this ISNT my most favorite Pizza and that would be Giordanos meatlover super deep dish!. Oops I digress. At MOD we always order the paper thin crust pizza and a salad bowl. Anyway, that's what the wife wants and I end up sneaking out later for a nice burger when she's asleep.

name: Edward Thomson
text: Very similar concept to Blaze Pizza, but with a more cozy atmosphere. The pizza itself has a nice thin crust that feels to have more wheat and whole grain than conventional pizza dough. The topping selection is relatively large leaving …More

name: Andre Burrow
text: Wonderful customer service and the best pizza

name: Paul Xumsai
text: Fast-casual pizza joint. This is  build-it-yourself pizza assembly line. Pick the dough, pick the sauce, pick the topping. If your pizza taste bad, it's your fault. Luckily, mine came out fine, …More

name: holly cow
text: Although I never eaten here I had a door dash delivery and the inside looked great the staff was nice to me got the costumers order to me early and I was on my way I would def recommend trying it it's just like blaze pizza but in my opinion better

name: Luba Starobin
text: Saw this new pizza spot and decided to come for lunch with a friend. We were not familiar with the menu and unsure what to get. The manager on duty gave us a management discounted so we could try a variety of things. What can I say, pizza …More

name: Ali Munasser
text: I had the Caspian and the pizza was not cooked well. The toppings and cheese fell off every time I tried to eat a slice. There was also no rush because I was the only one in the restaurant. It was very sloppy and it tasted below average. …More

name: Paa A
text: Great pizza for the price and great service for something quick.

name: R Demo
text: Simple and nice pizza spot. The pizza is inexpensive and very good for its value. The staff, above all, are all super cool people. An employee, dude with a firearm tattoo, came up and even talked to me about their really nice picture wall. …More

name: Yukta Mehta
text: Many timesI have enjoyed coming to this place and pizza has been great. But this last time their onions were days old. Onions so old can be toxic. Please keep all your ingredients fresh Mod!!

name: Barbara Solinski
text: Wonderful pizza made to you own liking. And quickly done!

name: Adrian Moran
text: I like this chain. I appreciate the selection of veggie topping and especially the dairy-free cheese. They are very fast and the super thin crust is quite tasty.

name: Livi Laree
text: Okay pizza but there was an employee there at the time who brought her kid to work the day I went in with my family and the kid was just being a kid, saying hi to us and trying to help us out but the mother took him to the back somewhere …More

name: Philip Noinaj
text: Cool place, simple pricing, so glad they have gluten free crust and they're pretty good at cooking it just enough that it's done in the middle as well. They have a good choice of toppings, which you can have an unlimited choice and it's all for one single price. Going to visit one again but closer to my place!

name: Ryan Fields
text: Excellent food, drinks, and service. There are different levels of heat but everything has some sort of spice on it. Even the salads!

name: Vanessa
text: I visited this MOD Pizza location around 6pm and there were barely any customers! Lucky me! Service was extremely fast, staff was very welcoming and enthusiastic, and the food met my expectations.

name: Sue Cleary
text: Great pizza.  I ordered gluten free crust. Very good,  and super fast.

name: Allison Giardina
text: Great price for the size of the pizza. Everything is made quickly. They actually put too much on my pizza (next time I'll ask for less), and it was hard to eat. Tasted great!

name: Bonnie McDonald
text: Friendly staff. Cheap. fast. I like that you go down the line and  pick what  you want on your pizza or salad. Perfect place for quick lunch on Friday. I had a mini it was perfect.

name: Leslie Carmona
text: Good food, great customer service

name: Alice
text: The food here is very fresh. They have a large  variety of toppings that can be put on a pizza or a salad. We like to go there after a movie or weekend shopping.

name: Vanessa Oertel
text: Wish I knew about this place sooner, my pizza was better then I expected. Staff was very helpful location was very clean.

name: Mark Akins
text: Great pizza. Been looking for a good alternative since Pie Five closed.  Great selection of toppings, great pizza. Just wish they had pan crust

name: Alex Milkowski
text: I really enjoy their pizza! I won't lie... i go there at least 3 times a week

name: Amy B
text: Great thin crust! Fresh ingredients with encouraged customization allowing you to design your best creation. Amazing staff, so fun and helpful!!!!

name: Gift Seangsri
text: I love to customize my own pizza and its fast.

name: Whitney Nuam
text: The owner/manager does not wear gloves!!! My husband and I were thrilled a Mod pizza opened up near us. The place is brand new and super clean...except the manager/owner wore no gloves. We watched as he handled the pizza dough, answered the …More

name: Ola Wisniewski
text: Excellent food, drinks and service. Highly recommend!

name: Addison Jackson
text: Great pizza! I'll definitely go back.

name: Drag Sut
text: finally we got a place where  you can eat a good pizza or maybe the best pizza, from brick oven and fresh dough

name: Bryan Zeigler
text: Fantastic experience!! They went way out of their way to ensure we all enjoyed our pizza. My daughter had an issue with her Maddy pizza. They made her another pizza immediately, no questions. This location is our MOD location of choice!!

name: Dan Sotelo
text: Clean place and friendly service. Perfect for the whole family.

name: David Schultz
text: Of all the "quick fire" pizza places around the Chicago area, MOD is by far my favorite. All the ingredients taste really fresh, and I always get friendly, attentive service every time I go. This location is still pretty new, but the staff …More

name: Sniper Tube
text: Mod pizza is the best!Thier pizza is the best!

name: Kathy Quinn
text: Love the choices and the staff is friendly. Not crowded.  In and out in a half hour.

name: Angel Gonzalez
text: Is good pizza fore one person, i like that it was thin crust, i like my with little more pizza sauce but it was still good, great customer service employees very friendly. I will come again soon.

name: Jessica A Gonzalez
text: My fav pizza all the toppings for a great price

name: Jerry Moore
text: Nice place with plenty of food options.

name: Tom Krol
text: Good pizza your way. Only wish this location served beer.

name: Linda Gartner
text: Went for a late lunch today with my adult, health-conscious  daughter. Friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable staff. Wow, the toppings for their pizza are amazing. You can also make your own pizza, two sizes. The crust was thin, crunchy, and …More

name: Liann T
text: I love getting to build my own pizza for a set price. They have great topping options and the pizzas taste really good. The staff often seems tired and inattentive. Restaurant is well kept and it's a great place to eat.

name: Barb Pohl
text: The salads are large and the ingredients fresh. You choose what you want on your pizza and in your salad. Plenty of variety for both: meats, cheeses, and veggies. The pizza crust is thin and crispy and you can opt for pesto, tomato and other sauces in addition to the toppings..

name: Karen Eisenstein
text: Delish, hot pizza, made my way!

name: Jene
text: Big individual sizes which you can customize! I'm not good tho with customizing cos I don't know what ingredients will complement each other so I go for the menu.

name: RoseAnn Taylor
text: Fast pizza, choose all the toppings you want, also the salads w/all different ingredients, so many to choose from....good prices for entire family. So glad we stopped there.

name: Jannette Gonzalez
text: If there was an option of giving no stars to this place, I would. The employees could care less about the customers. I went in there with my mom and my sister, and one of the employees was not welcoming at all. While it was my sister and …More

name: David Kadlec
text: My daughter has been asking to try this since it opened and today we decided to give it a try instead of driving over to Edison park for pizza. I'm glad we tried it. They asked us if we'd been there before and explained the menu to us. The …More

name: Kathryn Pruyn
text: Fresh ingredients, full customization, plant - based stuff I wouldn't bother to prep on my own... &still pretty fast. Like a bourge' subway but for pizza & salads.

name: Adrian Slemmons
text: Great pizza and service here. Highly recommended and much better for the same price as your average fast food.

name: Ben Lobo
text: Fantastic food, quality ingredients, and extremely humbling experience. Employees are outgoing and helpful. Love the overall corporate model.

name: Kate Christensen Millheiser
text: Easy place to enjoy pizza with those who have food restrictions. Not fantastic pizza, but great among these customizable-pie, quick-bake pizzerias.

name: Nicholas Gilbert
text: Simple idea, very well executed. The staff are really happy which is conveyed by the outstanding level of customer service. Try this place out if you haven't.

text: Love that everyone in family can get what they want here. Some eat "regular" pizza but some need a gluten-free crust and others need dairy-free cheese.
